statements: SELECT * FROM consensus_voting_data;
SELECT consensus_mechanism_name, consensus_mechanism_id FROM consensus_voting_data;
SELECT consensus_mechanism_id, voting_data FROM consensus_voting_data ORDER BY voting_data DESC;
SELECT * FROM consensus_voting_data WHERE consensus_mechanism_id = 1;
SELECT consensus_mechanism_name, voting_data FROM consensus_voting_data WHERE voting_data -> 'votes' > 100;
SELECT * FROM consensus_voting_data WHERE consensus_mechanism_id = 1;
SELECT consensus_mechanism_name, voting_data FROM consensus_voting_data WHERE consensus_mechanism_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM consensus_voting_data WHERE voting_data->'votes'->'yes' > 10;
SELECT consensus_mechanism_id, consensus_mechanism_name, json_array_length(voting_data->'votes') AS total_votes FROM consensus_voting_data;
SELECT * FROM consensus_voting_data ORDER BY consensus_mechanism_name DESC, consensus_mechanism_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM consensus_mechanisms
SELECT mechanism_name, description FROM consensus_mechanisms WHERE id = 1
SELECT id, voter_id, vote, timestamp FROM voting_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM voting_data WHERE voter_id = 101 AND mechanism_id = 2
SELECT mechanism_id, AVG(vote) AS average_vote FROM voting_data GROUP BY mechanism_id
SELECT mechanism_name, description FROM consensus_mechanisms WHERE id = 1;
SELECT voter_id, vote, mechanism_id FROM voting_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM consensus_mechanisms ORDER BY mechanism_name DESC;
SELECT mechanism_name, COUNT(*) as total_votes FROM consensus_mechanisms JOIN voting_data ON consensus_mechanisms.id = voting_data.mechanism_id GROUP BY mechanism_name;
SELECT id, voter_id, vote, timestamp FROM voting_data WHERE voter_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM consensus_mechanisms;
SELECT mechanism_id, mechanism_name FROM consensus_mechanisms WHERE mechanism_id = 1;
SELECT voter_name, vote_option, vote_timestamp FROM voting_data ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM governance_records WHERE record_type = 'Proposal';
SELECT record_id, record_type, record_details FROM governance_records ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM consensus_mechanisms ORDER BY mechanism_name DESC, mechanism_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT voter_name, vote_option FROM voting_data WHERE vote_timestamp > '2021-01-01' AND vote_option = 'Yes';
SELECT * FROM governance_records WHERE record_type = 'Proposal' AND created_at < NOW() - INTERVAL 7 DAY;
SELECT voter_name, COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM voting_data GROUP BY voter_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY total_votes DESC;

SELECT mechanism_name, description FROM consensus_mechanisms JOIN governance_records ON consensus_mechanisms.mechanism_id = governance_records.record_id WHERE governance_records.record_type = 'Decision';
SELECT * FROM governance_records WHERE decision = 'approved';
SELECT mechanism_name, description FROM consensus_mechanisms ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT voter_id, choice, timestamp FROM voting_data WHERE choice = 'yes' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT mechanism_name, voter_id, decision FROM governance_records WHERE decision = 'rejected';
SELECT * FROM consensus_votes WHERE choice = 'yes'
SELECT * FROM consensus_mechanisms WHERE launch_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT mechanism_name, description FROM consensus_mechanisms WHERE id = 3;
SELECT voter_id, choice, timestamp FROM voting_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT mechanism_name, COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM consensus_mechanisms JOIN consensus_votes ON consensus_mechanisms.id = consensus_votes.mechanism_id GROUP BY mechanism_name ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT mechanism_name, voter_id, decision FROM consensus_mechanisms JOIN governance_records ON consensus_mechanisms.id = governance_records.mechanism_id WHERE decision = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM consensus_mechanisms;
SELECT mechanism_name, launch_date FROM consensus_mechanisms WHERE launch_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT voter_name, voter_address FROM voters ORDER BY voter_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT category_name FROM mechanisms_categories;
SELECT c.mechanism_name, m.category_name FROM consensus_mechanisms c JOIN mechanism_category_map mc ON c.id = mc.mechanism_id JOIN mechanisms_categories m ON mc.category_id = m.category_id;
SELECT * FROM consensus_mechanisms;
SELECT mechanism_name, description FROM consensus_mechanisms WHERE launch_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT cm.id, cm.mechanism_name, vd.vote_decision FROM consensus_mechanisms cm JOIN voting_data vd ON cm.id = vd.mechanism_id WHERE vd.vote_decision = TRUE;

SELECT v.voter_name, vd.vote_decision, cm.mechanism_name FROM voters v JOIN voting_data vd ON v.voter_id = vd.voter_id JOIN consensus_mechanisms cm ON vd.mechanism_id = cm.id WHERE cm.launch_date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT mc.category_name, cm.mechanism_name FROM mechanisms_categories mc JOIN mechanism_category_map mcm ON mc.category_id = mcm.category_id JOIN consensus_mechanisms cm ON mcm.mechanism_id = cm.id;
